services.name: Website Development
services.description: Build custom websites and admin panels using modern technologies like ReactJS, NextJS, or converting designs like Figma and PSD into responsive websites.

services.name: User Interface (UI) Design
services.description: Design user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces that enhance user experience while aligning with the brand's identity.

services.name: Website Consultancy & Technical Advice
services.description: Provide expert advice on frontend technologies, best practices, and strategies to help clients make informed decisions about their projects.

services.name: Responsive Web Design & Optimization
services.description: Ensure websites are fully responsive, providing a seamless experience across devices with improved performance and SEO.

services.name: Website Maintenance and Support
services.description: Offer ongoing website maintenance and support services to ensure sites are secure, updated, and functioning smoothly.

services.name: Web Performance Optimization
services.description: Optimize websites by improving loading speeds, minimizing assets, and implementing lazy loading for a better user experience and SEO.

services.name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
services.description: Make sure websites are fully compatible and functional across all major web browsers, adhering to industry standards.

services.name: Accessibility Implementation
services.description: Implement accessibility features to ensure websites are usable by all, including individuals with disabilities, following WCAG guidelines.
